[Mars First] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each: [Mars First] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each building tag you have - Policy: When you place a tile ON MARS, gain 1 steel
[Scientists] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each: [Scientists] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each science tag you have - Policy: Pay 10 M€ to draw 3 cards (Turmoil Scientists)
[Unity] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each Venu: [Unity] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each Venus, Earth and Jovian tag you have - Policy: Your titanium resoures are worth 1 M€ extra
[Greens] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each Pla: [Greens] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each Plant, Microbe and Animal tag you have - Policy: When you place a greenery tile, gain 4 M€
[Reds] - Bonus: The players(s) with the: [Reds] - Bonus: The players(s) with the lowest TR gains 1 TR - Policy: When you take an action that raises TR, you MUST pay 3 M€ per step raised
[Kelvinists] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each: [Kelvinists] - Bonus: Gain 1 M€ for each heat production you have - Policy: Pay 10 M€ to increase your energy and heat production 1 step (Turmoil Kelvinists)
Place any final greenery from plants: Placez vos dernières Forêts en convertissant vos plantes
Wetlands: counts as an ocean and a green: Wetlands: counts as an ocean and a greenery. Does not count toward 9 oceans.
Red City: 1 VP per empty adjacent area. No greeneries may be placed next to it.
Moon Mine: 1 VP per adjacent road: Moon Mine: 1 VP per adjacent road
Moon Habitat: 1 VP per adjacent road: Moon Habitat: 1 VP per adjacent road
Luna Train Station: 2 VP per adjacent ro: Luna Train Station: 2 VP per adjacent road
Luna Mine Urbanization: counts as both a: Luna Mine Urbanization: counts as both a colony and a mine tile.
City: 1 VP per adjacent greenery: Cité : 1 PV par tuile Forêt adjacente
Ocean: grants 2M€ when players put tiles: Océan : rapporte 2 M€ lorsque les joueurs mettent une tuile à côté
Commercial District: 1 VP per adjacent c: Quartier Commercial : 1 PV par tuile Cité adjacente
Mild Erosion: lose 1 production when pla: Mild Erosion: lose 1 production when placing next to it. Pay 8M€ to place over it.
Mild Dust Storm: lose 1 production when: Mild Dust Storm: lose 1 production when placing next to it. Pay 8M€ to place over it.
Severe Erosion: lose 2 production when p: Severe Erosion: lose 2 production when placing next to it. Pay 16M€ to place over it.
Severe Dust Storm: lose 2 production whe: Severe Dust Storm: lose 2 production when placing next to it. Pay 16M€ to place over it.
Ocean City: counts as an ocean and a cit: Ocean City: counts as an ocean and a city.
Rey... Skywalker?: nothing may be placed: Rey... Skywalker?: nothing may be placed here

Warning: you do not have the 12 M€ requi: Warning: you do not have the 12 M€ required to act on a prelude.
You will only be able to build the colon: You will only be able to build the colony on Luna.
This prelude is not playable, so you wil: This prelude is not playable, so you will discard it and gain 15 M€.
You will be limited to excavating a spac: You will be limited to excavating a space that gives 1 energy production.
There are not enough cards to complete t: There are not enough cards to complete this action. You will draw fewer cards than expected.
Behavior in this card will apply to Doub: Behavior in this card will apply to Double Down, and so have no effect.
No cards gain the reward of this action.
